DOC.brief_summary: To estimate duration efficacy continue treatment double-blind flibanserin placebo twenty-four week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Flibanserin Randomized Withdrawal Trial Pre-menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women 18 premenopausal 2 . FSDSR 14 3 . Willingness try sexual activity least monthly 4 . Willingness use electronic diary daily 5 . Stable , monogamous , heterosexual relationship least one year 6 . Medically acceptable method contraception 1 . Clinically relevant condition might interfere patient 's abil ity participate trial 2 . Specified medication 3 . Sexual function affect medication 4 . Drug dependence abuse 5 . Sexual partner need treatment 6 . PeriMenopause Menopause ( surgical otherwise ) 7 . Pregnancy 8 . Pelvic Inflammatory Disease 9 . Major depressive Episode 10 . Significant ECG abnormalities 11 . Significant Neurologic finding 12 . Significant GI , Hepatic , Cardiovascular , Renal , Hematologic , Immunologic Respiratory finding 13 . Uncorrected thyroid endocrine disease 14 . Uncontrolled Glaucoma
